name: Jetpack Dog
description: What does the dog do when no one is home? He puts on a jetpack and, dodging lasers, collects bones!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
